Description: Notify the user when a new comment is added in the dashboard.
Subject: {:General.OrganizationName}: New comment added

Description: Notify the user when comments are deleted in the dashboard.
DefaultBodyContent:
Hello {:Recipient.UserName},

{:Recipient.DisplayName} has **deleted** a comment on the Dashboard - [{:Comments.DashboardName}]({:Comments.DashboardLink})

Regards,
{:General.OrganizationName}
Subject: {:General.OrganizationName}: Deleted the comment

Description: Notify the writer when their comment is deleted from the dashboard.
DefaultBodyContent:
Hello {:Recipient.UserName},

{:Recipient.DisplayName} has **deleted** your comment on the Dashboard - [{:Comments.DashboardName}]({:Comments.DashboardLink})

Regards,
{:General.OrganizationName}
Subject: {:General.OrganizationName}: Deleted the comment

Description: Notify the user when user comment replied to in the dashboard.
Subject: {:General.OrganizationName}: Reply to the comment

Description: Notify the comment writer when their comment receives a reply in the dashboard.
Subject: {:General.OrganizationName}: Reply to the comment

Description: Notify the user when they update their comment in the dashboard.
Subject: {:General.OrganizationName}: Updated the comment

Description: Notify the user when they are mentioned in a dashboard comment.
Subject: {:General.OrganizationName}: User Mention Dashboard Comment

Description: Notify the user when admin updates profile details.
HeaderContent: Your profile has been updated by System Administrator
Subject: {:General.OrganizationName}: Your profile has been updated by System Administrator

Description: Notify the user when admin shares permissions for all resources and settings.
DefaultBodyContent:
Hello {:Recipient.UserName},

{:Admin.UserName} has given you {:AccessName} access to all {:Resource.Type}.

[{:ItemURL}]({:Resource.Uri})

Regards,
{:General.OrganizationName}
HeaderContent: Access to all {:Resource.Type} has been provided.
Subject: {:General.OrganizationName}: You have been given {:AccessName} access to all {:Resource.Type}

Description: Notify the user when admin shares permissions for specific resources and settings.
DefaultBodyContent:
Hello {:Recipient.UserName},

{:Admin.UserName} has given you {:AccessName} access to specific {:Resource.Type} - '{:Resource.Name}'.

[{:ItemURL}]({:Resource.Uri})

Regards,
{:General.OrganizationName}
HeaderContent: Access to specific {:Resource.Type} has been provided.
Subject: {:General.OrganizationName}: You have been given access to the specific {:Resource.Type}

Description: Notify the user when the admin has granted them control over access permissions for resources or settings.
DefaultBodyContent:
Hello {:Recipient.UserName},

{:Admin.UserName} has given you access to manage {:Resource.Name} {:Resource.Type}.

[{:ItemURL}]({:Resource.Uri})

Regards,
{:General.OrganizationName}
HeaderContent: Manage permission access has been provided
Subject: {:General.OrganizationName}: Access to manage resource permission has been provided

Description: Notify the user of content exported when a configured condition is met.
DefaultBodyContent:
Hi {:Recipient.UserName},

The configured data notification condition has been met. 
 
Please find a snapshot of the current state of the dashboard attached.

Regards,
{:General.OrganizationName}
Subject: {:General.OrganizationName}: Data Alert - {:Schedule.Resource.Name}

Description: Notify the user of content exported based on preconfigured interval.
DefaultBodyContent:
Hello {:Recipient.UserName},

Please find attached, the dashboard that you had requested. 

Schedule - **{:Schedule.Resource.Name}** has exported the dashboard [{:Schedule.Resource.DashboardName}]({:Schedule.Resource.Uri}).

Regards,
{:General.OrganizationName}
Subject: {:General.OrganizationName}: Your scheduled dashboard

Description: Notify the user when export with preconfigured interval has failed.
Subject: {:General.OrganizationName}: Your scheduled dashboard has been failed

Description: Notify the user when condition-based export has failed.
Subject: {:General.OrganizationName}: Your data alert has been failed

Description: Notify the user when data source refresh at preconfigured interval has failed.
Subject: {:General.OrganizationName}: Your data refresh has been failed

Description: Notify the user when export with a preconfigured interval has been disabled by the system due to continuous failure.
DefaultBodyContent:
Hi {:Recipient.FullName},

The application deactivates dashboard export schedule **{:Schedule.Resource.Name}** due to {:Schedule.FailureCount} consecutive failures, go to schedule history [schedule history]({:Schedule.Resource.RunHistory}) to check the error details. You can enable the schedule once error has been resolved.

Regards,
{:General.OrganizationName}
HeaderContent: Your scheduled dashboard has been disabled
Subject: {:General.OrganizationName}: Your scheduled dashboard has been disabled

Description: Notify the user when condition-based export has been disabled by the system due to continuous failure.
DefaultBodyContent:
Hi {:Recipient.FullName},

The application deactivates dashboard alert schedule **{:Schedule.Resource.Name}** due to {:Schedule.FailureCount} consecutive failures, go to schedule history [schedule history]({:Schedule.Resource.RunHistory}) to check the error details. You can enable the schedule once error has been resolved.

Regards,
{:General.OrganizationName}
HeaderContent: Your data alert has been disabled
Subject: {:General.OrganizationName}: Your data alert has been disabled

Description: Notify the user when data refresh at a preconfigured interval has been disabled by the system due to continuous failure.
DefaultBodyContent:
Hi {:Recipient.FullName},

The application deactivates data refresh for **{:Schedule.Resource.DataSourceName}** due to {:Schedule.FailureCount} consecutive failures, go to schedule history [refresh history]({:Schedule.Resource.RunHistory}) to check the error details. You can enable the schedule once error has been resolved.

Regards,
{:General.OrganizationName}
HeaderContent: Your data refresh has been disabled
Subject: {:General.OrganizationName}: Your data refresh has been disabled

Description: Notify the admin when users and groups imported from Azure AD are synchronized successfully.
DefaultBodyContent:
Hi {:Recipient.DisplayName},

Users and groups have been successfully synchronized with your azure active directory.

**Users Synchronization**

- {:Synchronization.User.Modified.Count} user details were modified
- {:Synchronization.User.Deleted.Count} user(s) were deleted
- {:Synchronization.User.Duplication.Count} duplicate user(s) exists (Email already exists)
- {:Synchronization.User.Invalid.Count} invalid user(s) exists (Email address is Invalid).
- {:Synchronization.User.Failed.Count} user(s) were added

**Groups Synchronization**

- {:Synchronization.Group.Modified.Count} Group Details were modified
- {:Synchronization.Group.Deleted.Count} Group(s) were deleted
- {:Synchronization.Group.Duplicate.Count} duplicate group(s) exists (Group name already exists)

Regards,
{:General.OrganizationName}
Subject: {:General.OrganizationName}: Azure AD Users and Groups Synchronizationn Success

Description: Notify the admin when users and groups imported from Windows AD are synchronized successfully.
DefaultBodyContent:
Hi {:Recipient.DisplayName},

Users and groups have been successfully synchronized with your active directory.

**Users Synchronization**

- {:Synchronization.User.Modified.Count} user details were modified
- {:Synchronization.User.Deleted.Count} user(s) were deleted
- {:Synchronization.User.Duplication.Count} duplicate user(s) exists (Email already exists)
- {:Synchronization.User.Invalid.Count} invalid user(s) exists (Email address is Invalid).
- {:Synchronization.User.Failed.Count} user(s) were added

**Groups Synchronization**

- {:Synchronization.Group.Modified.Count} Group Details were modified
- {:Synchronization.Group.Deleted.Count} Group(s) were deleted
- {:Synchronization.Group.Duplicate.Count} duplicate group(s) exists (Group name already exists)

Note: New users could not be added since there are no remaining license(s) available.

Regards,
{:General.OrganizationName}
Subject: {:General.OrganizationName}: AD Users and Groups Synchronizationn Success

Description: Notify the admin when users imported from a database are synchronized successfully.
DefaultBodyContent:
Hi {:Recipient.DisplayName},

Users have been successfully synchronized with your existing database.

 **Users Synchronization** 

- {:Synchronization.User.Modified.Count} user details were modified
- {:Synchronization.User.Deleted.Count} user(s) were deleted
- {:Synchronization.User.Duplication.Count} duplicate user(s) exists
- {:Synchronization.User.Failed.Count} user(s) were not found in the database
- {:Synchronization.User.Invalid.Count} invalid user(s) exists (Email address is Invalid).

Regards,
{:General.OrganizationName}
Subject: {:General.OrganizationName}: Database Synchronizationn Success

Description: Notify the admin when the Synchronizationn failed for the users or groups imported from Azure Active Directory.
Subject: {:General.OrganizationName}: Azure AD Users and Groups Synchronizationn Failed

Description: Notify the admin when the Synchronizationn failed for the users or groups imported from Windows Active Directory.
Subject: {:General.OrganizationName}: AD Users and Groups Synchronizationn Failed

Description: Notify the admin when the Synchronizationn failed for the users imported from a database.
Subject: {:General.OrganizationName}: Database Synchronizationn failed

Description: Notify the user of user activation.
Subject: Verify your email address

Description: Notify the user of user invitation.
Subject: {:SenderName} has invited you to {:General.OrganizationName}
